sections.heading: Short title.Section 32A-23B-2 - Definitions.Section 32A-23B-3 - Home visiting programs; accountability; exclusions; contracting; reporting.
sections.text:
Chapter 32A, Article 23B NMSA 1978 may be cited as the "Home Visiting Accountability Act".

History:Laws 2013, ch. 118, § 1; 2019, ch. 48, § 27.

The 2019 amendment,effective July 1, 2020, changed "This act" to "Chapter 32A, Article 23B NMSA 1978".

sections.heading: Definitions.
Home visiting programs; accountability; exclusions; contracting; reporting.
